metaTitle: Intensive AI Course - Learn to Use AI Professionally
metaDescription: Learn to use AI correctly and save time every day. Step-by-step hands-on training with a final project that proves your skills
heroTitle: Use AI Correctly… and Save Time Every Day
heroPromiseLine: Satisfying results in 1–3 tries (most of the time) + a working shareable project link by Day 5.
heroSubtitle: A practical bootcamp for non-technical adults: write clearer prompts, improve outputs fast, verify key facts, and apply it all in a shippable final project.
philosophySubtitle: In 5 days, you'll learn how to write clear "requests" that make AI tools give you organized, accurate results that are applicable to work and study.
howItWorksCard1Text: Context + Role + Examples + Output format + Clear refinement.
howItWorksCard2Text: Precise refinement rules + a stop rule (don't loop "make it better").
howItWorksCard3Text: Draft & plan in ChatGPT, verify facts/sources in Gemini, then build & publish in Lovable.
ctaTitle: Ready to Develop Your AI Skills?
ctaSubtitle: You'll get a clear training path and practical exercises, with support materials and assistance during the course.
day5OutcomeTitle: By the end of Day 5, you will have:
day5OutcomeBullet1: A working Minimum Lovable Product + a shareable link
day5OutcomeBullet2: A reusable prompt template library for your real tasks
day5OutcomeBullet3: A repeatable workflow: Write → Verify → Build
ctaGuarantee: Includes templates, daily summaries, and support during the bootcamp.
enrollmentSubtitle: Please fill out all required fields to complete your enrollment.

enrollmentForm.dataUsageText: Your information will be used to process your enrollment, issue course certificates, and provide course updates. We respect your privacy and will never share your data with third parties.

programFeature2: Clearer, faster results instead of random attempts
programFeature3: Final project that proves your skills
targetAudienceSubtitle: This course is right for you if:
targetAudience1: You use ChatGPT or Gemini, but results sometimes come out generic or unorganized.
targetAudience2: You waste time reformulating requests repeatedly.
targetAudience3: You want to write content, messages, and plans faster and with better quality.
targetAudience4: You want a simple method to follow every time to get consistent results.
targetAudienceNote: No prior technical experience needed; just a desire to apply what you learn.
output2: Study system: summaries + self-testing + organized references
output3: Work outputs: executive updates, emails, action plans
output4: A shareable page/portfolio/presentation — plus a small working project link
benefitsTitle: Ready to Develop Your AI Skills?
benefitsSubtitle: You'll get a clear training path and practical exercises, with support materials and assistance during the course.
benefit1Description: Get the latest content and techniques for free, for life
benefit2Description: Join a community of specialists to exchange experiences and ideas
benefit3Description: Get a certified certificate proving your skill mastery
benefit4Description: WhatsApp support to answer your questions
benefit5Description: Ready-to-use files and templates for work and study
day1Description: How AI tools work in a simplified way
day1Topics: How AI tools work in a simplified way
Transform goals into clear requests instead of random trial
Professional prompt elements: goal, information, constraints, output format, example
How to make responses "organized" instead of long text
Common mistakes that lead to generic results
day1Techniques: "Task summary" template before writing the prompt
Adding measurable constraints (length, style, number of points)
Quick result testing and one-time improvement
day1Deliverable: CREAR templates + your first usable output
day2Description: How to request options, comparisons, and plans systematically
day2Topics: How to request options, comparisons, and plans systematically
How to control response length, tone, and level
How to ask in a way that makes responses more accurate with less filler
How to build fixed templates for recurring tasks
Simple quality gates before approving results
day2Techniques: "Think step by step" when more accurate results are needed
Quick review template: What's missing? What needs constraints?
Creating two versions of the same prompt (quick/detailed)
day2Deliverable: Refinement cheat sheet + stop rule practice
day3Description: How to write research requests that give useful summaries
day3Topics: How to write research requests that give useful summaries
How to gather information without "generic filler"
How to request sources and clear points
Extracting action items and recommendations from any material
Comparing when to use ChatGPT vs. research tools
day3Techniques: Summarization with structured outputs (summary + action items + risks)
Preparing a concise report ready to send
Documenting results in one file for reference
day3Deliverable: Verification plan template + safe wording patterns
day4Description: Weekly/monthly content plan in a clear way
day4Topics: Weekly/monthly content plan in a clear way
Writing a landing/about page in an organized way
(Optional) Basics of generating supporting images for content
day4Techniques: Ready content templates (idea + opening + points + call to action)
Landing page template (headline + benefits + proof + call)
day5Description: How to fix any unsatisfactory result in minutes
day5Topics: How to fix any unsatisfactory result in minutes
Evaluating results with clear criteria instead of impressions
Privacy rules and what not to input into tools
Building a simple workflow: from prompt → result → final version
Final project that proves the skill
day5Techniques: Simple evaluation model (clarity, organization, usefulness, accuracy)
Final "template package" based on trainee's field
Post-course continuation plan (how to maintain the level)
testimonial1Content: I started my own business, and my problem was that AI results came out scattered. After the course, I now write requests in a way that makes results ready to use, saving me hours weekly.
testimonial2Content: I'm a master's student and need accurate summaries and research. I learned how to request sources and produce clear reports instead of long paragraphs.
testimonial3Content: As an executive, I need quick decisions and organized summaries. What I liked most is the approach of making answers concise, organized, and ready to send to the team.
testimonial4Content: I'm a content creator, and ideas used to get lost in repetition. Now I have fixed templates for content ideas, texts, and Hooks, and I produce faster and better.
moneyBackGuarantee: Quality Guarantee • Instant Access • Join Hundreds of Participants

accessWarning.title: Course Access Required
accessWarning.description: You have successfully signed in, but you need to complete the payment and enroll in the course to have access to the materials.

faqSubtitle: Answers to the most common questions about the AI course

faq.question: What are the requirements to join the course?
faq.answer: No prior technical experience needed. Just a desire to apply what you learn and basic computer knowledge.

faq.question: Is the course online or in-person?
faq.answer: The course is available online live with the ability to interact with the instructor and participants.

faq.question: How long is the course?
faq.answer: The course is intensive for 5 days, with 4 hours per day.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes, you'll receive a course completion certificate after completing all requirements and the final project.

faq.question: Is there support after the course?
faq.answer: Yes, you'll join the graduate community and receive free content updates.

enrollment.successMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your seat and complete the registration.

pricingNote: No online payment. After booking, we'll contact you to confirm registration and payment details.
